    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_82373</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Recherche de la vie extraterrestre</string>
            <string language="en">Search for extra-terrestrial life</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Suche nach extra-terrestrial Lebensdauer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Busca para a vida extra-terrestrial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricerca di vita extra-terrestrial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναζήτηση της εξωγήινης ζωής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Búsqueda para la vida extraterrestre</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ces illustrations montrent la possibilité de l'existence d'une autre planète capable de soutenir la vie.</string>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show the possibility of the existence of another planet capable of sustaining life.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la vie extraterrestre</string>
            <string language="en">extra-terrestrial life</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">galaxies</string>
            <string language="en">galaxies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">les planètes</string>
            <string language="en">Planets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">SETI</string>
            <string language="en">SETI</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">étoile</string>
            <string language="en">stars</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen die Möglichkeit des 
Bestehens eines anderen Planeten, der zum Unterstützen des Lebens 
fähig ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram a possibilidade da 
existência de um outro planeta capaz de sustentar a vida.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni mostrano la possibilità 
dell'esistenza di un altro pianeta capace di sostenimento della vita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν τη δυνατότητα της 
ύπαρξης ενός άλλου πλανήτη ικανού τη ζωή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran la posibilidad de la
existencia de otro planeta capaz de sostener vida.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">extra-terrestrial Lebensdauer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Galaxien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Planeten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SETI</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sterne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
